name: The Ultimate Clicker Master of the Universe
name_original: The Ultimate Clicker Master of the Universe
description:
After your life collapsed, the only one trustworthy in this world seems to be a mysterious penguin wizard who promises you to use his magic skills to take revenge. Asked to reactivate an old magic rune stone, you follow his pleading in the cold north. But you are not alone - other broken men are trying to unleash the ultimate power of their rune stones. But only one can become the Ultimate Clicker of the Universe.

- Take part in the ultimate high score based multiplayer experience!

- Never seen before "thinking out of the box"-gameplay

- You against the whole world of gamers!

- Persistent gameplay

- Best penguin-humor on Steam

- Founded on Kickstarter

- More speling mistakes than all Monkey Island Games together!

The game Ends at 21. December - winter solstice - with the great final which depends on the decision made by the then current Clicker Master of the Universe!

So hurry, just 34 wishlist-places left! Wishlist the game now!
